title: Dashboard for Data Visualization
description: Developed a dashboard using PostgreSQL, Python, Django, and React to visualize data from JSON datasets.

title: QR Code Generator Web Application
description: Created a web application using React.js to generate QR codes from URLs, focusing on a user-friendly interface.

title: Virtual Mouse
description: Developed a virtual mouse using OpenCV, MediaPipe, and Python for real-time hand tracking and gesture recognition.
